title: Secret superstar
feed: Secret Superstar is a 2017 Indian Hindi-language musical drama film written and directed by Advait Chandan, and produced by Aamir Khan and Kiran Rao under the studio Aamir Khan Productions.

title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
feed: Bajrangi Bhaijaan ( transl. Brother Bajrangi) is a 2015 Indian Hindi-language comedy-drama film.

title: Dangal
feed: Dangal ( transl. Wrestling competition) is a 2016 Indian Hindi-language biographical sports drama film directed by Nitesh Tiwari and produced by Aamir Khan, under his studio Aamir Khan Productions with UTV Motion Pictures and Walt Disney Pictures India.

title: Bahubali
feed: The Beginning is a 2015 Indian epic action film directed by S.S Rajamouli and produced by Shobu Yarlagadda and Prasad Devineni, and shot simultaneously in Telugu.
